channel.title: Big Problem!
channel.description:
Basically every time you log in all your stats and your position is reset and I don't understand why here is my code/codes: Filemanager.java:
stream.writeString("zombierew:" + p.zombierew);
and also:
else if (line.startsWith("zombierew:")) p.zombierew = Integer.parseInt(line.substring(9));
in Player.java:
public int zombierew = 0;
Thats pretty much it.. need anything else I can post.. Can anybody help please?

item.title: Big Problem!
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

Check your code after and before the zombie stuff to see if there’s any saving and/or loading that you may of accidently changed. Saving and loading will most likely be in Player.java. Not sure if there’d be anything in Filemanager.

If not, post all your saving and loading methods you find and we can check, if you don’t already figure it out.

Also, just quote out the zombie stuff and then see if it still resets, if so you know that there’s something else that may have been changed, intentional or not.

Read full topic

It would save fine before I added the Zombie Reward Points / ZombieRew

item.title: Big Problem!
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

Check your character save and load methods. It’s obviously not saving and/or loading when you logout/login.
